title: Follow live: Warriors, Rockets square off in decisive Game 7
author: ESPN staff

title: Pacers bury top-seeded Cavs in 3s to take Game 1
description: The Pacers used a barrage of 3-pointers to stun the top-seeded Cavaliers 121-112 in Sunday night's Game 1.

title: Zhao leads but Williams fights back in compelling Crucible final
description: Zhao Xintong holds an 11-6 lead after three-time winner Mark Williams steadied the ship on day one of the World Championship final.

title: Piastri wins from Norris in Miami to extend lead
description: McLaren's Oscar Piastri wins for the fourth time in six races this year as he beats team-mate Lando Norris in the Miami Grand Prix.

title: Jacksonville Jaguars' 2025 UDFA profile: Duke WR Eli Pancol
description: Let's take a closer look at each of the Jacksonville Jaguars' UDFAs. Up first is Duke wide receiver Eli Pancol.

title: Injury Update: Gary Payton II (illness) ruled out for Game 7 vs. Rockets
description: The Warriors will be without Gary Payton II for Game 7 against the Rockets on Sunday due to an illness.

title: Amorim: Man Utd not ready to compete in Champions League next season
description: Ruben Amorim says Manchester United are not ready to be competitive in the Premier League and Champions League next season.

title: Benn open to Pacquiao fight if no Eubank Jr rematch as he reveals 'rookie mistake'
description: Conor Benn has suggested he could fight Manny Pacquiao next if a rematch with Chris Eubank Jr does not materialise.
